remove_crocodile.definition: Remove crocodile from this space, gain $1.

remove_pay_discard.definition: Symbol indicates a cost to remove, pay, or discard.

gain_take_obtain.definition: Symbol indicates a gain, item taken, or effect obtained.

roses.definition: Roses are wild, and can be used in place of grape, stone, wheat, or fish (multiple roses may be used, even when ≠ resources are required).

paying_resources_with_money.definition: When paying resources, in place of a single grape, stone, or wheat, you may instead pay $3.

channel_adjacency.definition: Spaces separated by the channel are not considered adjacent; Bridges connect these spaces but do not make them adjacent.

card_play_bonus.definition: When playing a card you may gain $2 instead of doing its action.

space_types.definition: Spaces on the map can be developed (built on), undeveloped (unbuilt, and/or with crocodile), and crocodile-free (ready for development).

towns_and_workshops.definition: Towns count as settlements for actions, but not for scoring; likewise expanded workshops count as workshops.

placing_roads_settlements_bonus.definition: When placing roads or settlements, gain 1 rep for each first direct connection made.
